lead_paragraph: The pianist Juho Pohjonen, the violinist Benjamin Beilman and the cellist Jan Vogler explored the relationship between two composers more than a century apart.

headline.main: Review: Schubert and Schnittke, a Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center Concert
